desc: I create artistic African-American themed badge reels, sorority paraphernalia and melanin laced accessories so that people can see positive, representative images of them in their chosen professions.

layout.text: BADGE REELS, TOTES, ACCESSORIES, WORK WEAR AND TRAVEL GEAR.

We specialize in providing the endless variety of melanin uniqueness, professionalism AND brilliance that permeates the things we enjoy through our custom reels and other gorgeous designs. YOU. DESERVE. TO. BE. SEEN.
